Articles.Content:
Hi! This is my attempt to recreate the legendary FW 190 in his best version, the dora 13.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

ATTENTION THIS CRAFT REQUIRES FIRESPITTER MOD FOR WORK

craft file:

http://www./view/lf81z2nbo0i5i64/Focke%20Wulf%20190%20d13.craft

Edited January 22, 2014 by eorin
It's a nice fighter, but the thin wings and bulgy engine make it more closely related to the I.A.R-80 Romanian fighter

It's a nice fighter, but the thin wings and bulgy engine make it more closely related to the I.A.R-80 Romanian fighter

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/57/IAR-80.jpg

the wings are made like it because i wanted to use firespitter only for the engine so i can fit a purely stock jet version if i want. The engine is like this because: 1) it's not possible doing it better with stocks parts imo; 2) the Fw 190 d 13 had the front engine with air flow pannels that can open and close, so my replica is like it has the panels all open.

Sorry for my bad english.

note the front panels for air flow

i have accidentally posted 2 time the same message

Edited January 22, 2014 by eorin
nice replica here, love ww II aircraft. wish there were a stock prop

nice replica here, love ww II aircraft. wish there were a stock prop

I hope the same =) we really need at least one.
